TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceAuthorizationBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class ServiceAuthorizationBehavior Implements IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 提供与服务授权行为相关的属性。

span.span: Provides properties related to service authorization behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 授权可在服务级别和操作级别发生。Authorization occurs at the service level and at the operation level. 此类包含与在服务级别发生的授权相关的属性。This class contains properties related to authorization at the service level.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，应用程序不直接调用构造函数。Typically, applications do not call the constructor directly. 而是通过调用 `ServiceHostBase.Description.Behaviors.Find` 来检索此类的实例。Instead they retrieve an instance of this class by calling `ServiceHostBase.Description.Behaviors.Find`. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何检索此类的实例。The following code shows how to retrieve an instance of this class. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为 `false` 指示为每个操作指定模拟。A value of `false` indicates that impersonation is specified for each operation. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. summary.span: 获取或设置主体权限模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the principal permission mode.
The principal permission mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含 枚举的成员之一。This property contains one of the members of the enumeration. 有效值是：Valid values are: - .. 自定义 `IAuthorizationPolicy` 实现用于填充 `Thread.CurrentPrincipal`。A custom `IAuthorizationPolicy` implementation is used to populate `Thread.CurrentPrincipal`. - .. 未设置 `Thread.CurrentPrincipal` 属性。The `Thread.CurrentPrincipal` property is not set. - .. 根据 ASP.NET 角色信息将 `Thread.CurrentPrincipal` 属性设置为 `IPrincipal`。The `Thread.CurrentPrincipal` property is set to an `IPrincipal` based on ASP.NET role information. - .. 根据传入消息的用户凭据，将 `Thread.CurrentPrincipal` 属性设置为 `WindowsPrincipal`。The `Thread.CurrentPrincipal` property is set to a `WindowsPrincipal` based on the user credentials of the incoming message. ## Examples 此代码演示如何设置此属性。This code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[c_PrincipalPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_principalpermissionattribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[c_PrincipalPermissionAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_principalpermissionattribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务授权管理器。

span.span: Gets or sets the service authorization manager.
The service authorization manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类负责评估所有策略、正向和反向链接、有选择地将得到的 连接到 并返回 `true` 或 `false` 的授权决定，以允许或拒绝访问。The class is responsible for evaluating all policies, chaining forward and backward, optionally connecting the resulting to the and returning the authorization decision of `true` or `false` to allow or deny access. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何将此属性设置为使用自定义服务授权管理器。The following code shows how to set this property to use a custom service authorization manager. [!code-csharp[PrincipalPermissionMode#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PrincipalPermissionMode#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/principalpermissionmode/vb/source.vb#3)]
